languages.text: {n}Мейв печально вздыхает.{/n} "Хотела бы я... но, должно быть, его великолепие столь ослепительно, что при взгляде на Его лик можно вмиг потерять зрение. Ой, простите, вы, наверное, хотели что-то спросить?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Лидзи печально вздыхает.{/n} "Хотела бы я увидеть Его хоть одним глазком! Но, мне кажется, Он должен так ослепительно сиять, что при взгляде на Его лик можно вмиг потерять зрение. Ой, простите, вы, наверное, хотели что-то спросить? А я тут со своим любопытством..."

languages.text: {n}Maive lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him... but I am sure His splendour is so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me. You probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Мейв печально вздыхает.{/n} "Хотела бы я... но, должно быть, его великолепие столь ослепительно, что при взгляде на Его лик можно вмиг потерять зрение. Ой, простите, вы, наверное, хотели что-то спросить?"

{n}Lidzy lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him, even just a glimpse! But I'm sure He shines so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me, you probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you? And here I am, caught up in my own curiosity..."

{n}Maive lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him... but I am sure His splendour is so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me, you probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you?"

{n}Maive lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him... but I am sure His splendour is so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me. You probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you?"

languages.text: {n}梅芙发出了孤独的叹息。{/n}“要是我能亲眼见到祂就好了……但我相信，祂的目光一定非常耀眼。只要看一眼祂的面容，就足以令凡人当场失明。噢，抱歉，您应该是有问题要问我吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Maive lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him... but I am sure His splendour is so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me. You probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙发出了孤独的叹息。{/n}“要是我能亲眼见到祂就好了……但我相信，祂的目光一定非常耀眼。只要看一眼祂的面容，就足以令凡人当场失明。噢，抱歉，您应该是有问题要问我吧？”

languages.text: {n}Maive suspira con añoranza.{/n} «Ojalá pudiese verlo... pero estoy segura de que Su esplendor es tan deslumbrante que una sola mirada bastaría para cegarme en el acto. Oh, perdóneme. Seguramente quería preguntarme algo, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Maive lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him... but I am sure His splendour is so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me. You probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive suspira con añoranza.{/n} «Ojalá pudiese verlo... pero estoy segura de que Su esplendor es tan deslumbrante que una sola mirada bastaría para cegarme en el acto. Oh, perdóneme. Seguramente quería preguntarme algo, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: {n}Maive kederle iç çekiyor.{/n} "Keşke O'nu görebilseydim... Eminim ki ihtişamı o kadar göz kamaştırıcıdır ki çehresine tek bir bakış bile bir insanı anında kör etmeye yetiyordur. Şey, affedin beni. Muhtemelen bana bir şey soracaktınız, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Maive lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him... but I am sure His splendour is so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me. You probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive kederle iç çekiyor.{/n} "Keşke O'nu görebilseydim... Eminim ki ihtişamı o kadar göz kamaştırıcıdır ki çehresine tek bir bakış bile bir insanı anında kör etmeye yetiyordur. Şey, affedin beni. Muhtemelen bana bir şey soracaktınız, değil mi?"

languages.text: {n}メイヴはがっかりした様子でため息をつく。{/n}「陛下にお目にかかれたらと思いますが、陛下の輝きは目もくらむほどまぶしいので、一目見ただけで盲目になってしまうでしょう。あぁ、失礼しました。私に何か聞きたかったのではないですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Maive lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him... but I am sure His splendour is so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me. You probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴはがっかりした様子でため息をつく。{/n}「陛下にお目にかかれたらと思いますが、陛下の輝きは目もくらむほどまぶしいので、一目見ただけで盲目になってしまうでしょう。あぁ、失礼しました。私に何か聞きたかったのではないですか？」

languages.text: {n}Maive pousse un long soupir de désespoir.{/n} « J'aimerais pouvoir Le voir un jour... mais je suis sûre que Sa splendeur est si éblouissante qu'un seul regard suffit à nous aveugler. Oh, pardonnez-moi. Vous vouliez probablement me demander quelque chose. »
languages.original_text: {n}Maive lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him... but I am sure His splendour is so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me. You probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive pousse un long soupir de désespoir.{/n} « J'aimerais pouvoir Le voir un jour... mais je suis sûre que Sa splendeur est si éblouissante qu'un seul regard suffit à nous aveugler. Oh, pardonnez-moi. Vous vouliez probablement me demander quelque chose. »

languages.text: {n}Maive seufzt traurig.{/n} "Ich wünschte, ich könnte ihn sehen ... Aber sein Glanz ist gewiss so strahlend hell, dass ein einziger Blick ausreichen würde, um mich auf der Stelle erblinden zu lassen. Oh, verzeiht mir. Ihr wolltet mich vermutlich etwas fragen, oder?"
languages.original_text: {n}Maive lets out a forlorn sigh.{/n} "I wish I could see Him... but I am sure His splendour is so dazzlingly bright that one glance upon His visage is enough to blind a person on the spot. Oh, pardon me. You probably wanted to ask me something, didn't you?"
